content.subTitle: Hello word 1
content.text: A survival horror game inspired by Bioshock, Dark Meadow: The Pact has a post-apocalyptic setting with a surprising fairy-tale twist. You will be fighting bloodthirsty goblins roaming the dilapidated halls of an abandoned hospital, seeking the warm blood of the living. More fear strikes as you encounter a witch, and eliminating her is the only way to escape the hospital.

content.subTitle: Hello Hello 2
content.text: A survival horror game inspired by Bioshock, Dark Meadow: The Pact has a post-apocalyptic setting with a surprising fairy-tale twist. You will be fighting bloodthirsty goblins roaming the dilapidated halls of an abandoned hospital, seeking the warm blood of the living. More fear strikes as you encounter a witch, and eliminating her is the only way to escape the hospital.
